head.title: Baked Scallops with Oyster Cracker Crumbs

ing.item: Freshly ground black pepper; to taste

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 375Â°F. Have on hand a 9x13" baking dish.
In the bowl of a food processor, combine the garlic and parsley. Pulse until the mixture is coarsley chopped. Add the crackers and process again just until they are crushed. Add the paprika, orange rind, salt, and pepper and process just until thoroughly combined.
Set the scallops in the baking dish. Sprinkle with the crumb mixture and drizzle with the oil. Bake 20 minutes or until they feel springy when pressed. Serve at once.
